hero.title: Democratic Franchise Model for Collective Ownership
hero.subtitle: 10, 15 or 20 partners. One business. Shared control. Shared profit.

concept.label: Concept Overview
concept.title: Cooperative Franchise Architecture
concept.text: ALTSETING introduces a franchise model where partners jointly create, manage, and profit from a single business entity under a democratic structure.

preview.label: How It Works
preview.title: Infographic Preview
preview.text: Explore the full operational flow and governance logic in the dedicated infographic page.

cta.label: Next Step
cta.title: Apply to Participate
cta.text: Submit your interest to join the next franchise group formation cycle.

infographic.label: Core Model
infographic.title: Full Infographic
infographic.subtitle: A visual walkthrough of the complete franchise system.

steps.title: Step 1 — Group Formation
steps.text: A fixed number of partners form a franchise group.

steps.title: Step 2 — Capital Contribution
steps.text: Each participant contributes an equal fixed investment.

steps.title: Step 3 — Cooperative Entity Creation
steps.text: A cooperative entity is legally formed.

steps.title: Step 4 — ALTSETING as Chairman
steps.text: ALTSETING acts as the governing head, ensuring structure, legality, and strategic alignment.

steps.title: Step 5 — Democratic Management
steps.text: Each partner has one vote. Key decisions are made collectively.

steps.title: Step 6 — Business Operations
steps.text: The business operates under shared management and predefined roles.

steps.title: Step 7 — Profit Distribution
steps.text: Net profit is distributed among partners according to the agreement.

terms.label: Participation Terms
terms.title: Key Participation Terms
terms.intro: Clear, transparent participation rules for every partner.
items: Voting rights: one partner, one vote
Exit rules: structured buy-out and transfer policy

governance.label: Governance & Control
governance.title: Governance Model
governance.intro: A governance framework designed for trust, accountability, and auditability.
items: Equal voting rights for every partner

revenue.label: Revenue & Profit
revenue.title: Revenue & Distribution
revenue.intro: Profitability is aligned with sustainability and reinvestment goals.

about.label: About ALTSETING
about.title: ALTSETING Role
about.intro: ALTSETING provides strategic, legal, and operational supervision across the franchise network.
